mapper.insert: insert into VOC_REGISTRATION (REG_SEQ, CHANNEL, TITLE, CONTENT, REG_COMMENT, CUST_ID, REG_USR) values( #{regSeq}, #{channel}, #{title}, #{content}, #{regComment}, #{custId}, #{loginUsr} )
mapper.update: update VOC_REGISTRATION set channel = #{channel}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, reg_comment = #{regComment}, reg_usr = #{regUsr} where reg_seq = #{regSeq}
mapper.insert: insert into voc_reg_prcd (REG_PRCD_SEQ, REG_SEQ, MC_PRCD_SEQ, DEADLINE_DT, MOD_USR) values ( #{regPrcdSeq}, #{regSeq}, #{mcPrcdSeq}, #{deadlineDt}, #{modUsr} )
